oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Arrington Vineyards Live Music Friday
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Advertising; Restrikes; Woodcuts (prints);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (maroon and blue on white) announcing Arrington Vineyards, Tennessee's premier winery, with live music every Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Poster features a woodcut of the Arrington Event Hall. This poster was reprinted in 2010, 2011, 2012, 2014 and 2016. Posters printed after the original edition are known as "restrikes."
